subdivision_of_building: Front - please read planning statement and view associated plans
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): 05 001 EXISTING SITE LOCATION PLAN; 05 002 EXISTING SITE SURVEY PLAN; 05 010 EXISTING BUILDING SURVEY PLAN; 05 110 EXISTING BUILDING FLOOR PLANS; 05 112 EXISTING ROOF PLAN; 05 120 EXISTING ELEVATIONS; 06 002 PROPOSED SITE PLAN; 06 110 PROPOSED GROUND FLOOR PLAN; 06 111 PROPOSED FIRST FLOOR PLAN; 06 112 PROPOSED ROOF PLAN; 06 120 PROPOSED ELEVATIONS; PLANNING DESIGN AND ACCESS STATEMENT DECEMBER 2023; DESIGN AND ACCESS STATEMENT 2023; PHOTOGRAPHS OF SITE AND SURROUNDINGS; 06 720 (PROPOSED MATERIALS)
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and the Ealing Local Plan 2022 (Reg 18).

| The proposed dormer window on the north elevation at first floor level hereby approved shall at no time be openable or glazed, otherwise than in obscured glass, below a minimum height of 1.7 metres above the relevant floor level.
Reason: To ensure that the proposed development does not prejudice the amenities of adjoining occupiers, in accordance with Policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
description: Single storey front extension; installation of two first floor side-facing dormer windows; installation of new double door and rendering of parts of side elevations; external alterations to access; new hard surfacing to the front of the church; provision of external seating area and associated planters and boundary treatment
